mapper.update: update register_message set status = 1 where id =#{id}
update patient set password=#{newPass} where username =#{username} and password =#{password}
update arrangement_message set registered_amounts=registered_amounts+1 where doctor_name = #{doctorName} and register_type=#{name} where id=#{id}
update register_type set registered_amounts=registered_amounts+1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from patient where username=#{username} and password=#{password}
select * from doctor where name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and department like concat('%',#{department},'%')
select r.*,t.type_name,t.cost,t.continue_time,t.department from register_type r right join type_message t on r.type_id=t.id where t.department=#{department}

select t.*,r.doctor_name,r.register_amounts,r.registered_amounts,r.date from register_type r right join type_message t on r.type_id=t.id where t.type_name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and t.department like concat('%',#{department},'%')
select name from patient where id = #{id}
